Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Women's Issues and the Committee on Small Business

Items.Title: Oversight - Implementation of the City’s Minority and Women-Owned Business Enterprise Program.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Implementation of the City’s Minority and Women-Owned Business Enterprise Program.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to requiring the department of small business services to submit an annual report regarding the satisfaction of minority and women owned business enterprises goals by recipients of economic development benefits
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the dept of small business services to submit an annual report regarding the satisfaction of minority and women owned business enterprises goals by recipients of economic development benefits.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring training for agency chief contracting officers and agency M/WBE officers and posting related information on the city’s website
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring training for agency chief contracting officers and agency M/WBE officers and posting related information on the city’s website.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the establishment of an M/WBE advisory board
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishment of an M/WBE advisory board.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring agency minority and women-owned business enterprise utilization plans to be published online
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring agency minority and women-owned business enterprise utilization plans to be published online.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to amending reporting requirements and agency goals related to participation of minority and women owned business enterprises in procurements
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Amending reporting requirements and agency goals related to participation of minority and women owned business enterprises in procurements.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to amending reporting requirements related to M/WBE participation
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Amending reporting requirements related to M/WBE participation.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring a minority and women-owned business enterprise consultant for city projects with budgets in excess of ten million dollars
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring a minority and women-owned business enterprise consultant for city projects with budgets in excess of ten million dollars.

Items.Title: Resolution adopting the rule amendment of the Procurement Policy Board to raise the micropurchase limit for the procurement and award of construction contracts to $35,000.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Adopting the rule amendment of the Procurement Policy Board to raise the micropurchase limit for the procurement and award of construction contracts to $35,000.
